data.title: Sir Stanley Matthews Travel – Sports Travel Management
data.text:
About Us

Just like Sir Stanley Matthews himself, we know that getting the small things right can make the biggest difference.

His commitment to marginal gains, such as in his diet and training regimes, is mirrored by what we see as our responsibility to overdeliver, even when it comes to the smallest details of your experience.

We understand the nuances and unique demands of sports travel, so your consultant is on hand throughout each phase of your travel plans- and at any time you need them.

Our team has dealt with a range of complex situations, including the issues and delays that come with large groups travelling separately, so we are confident about our ability to deal with even the largest, last minute setbacks.

Our Ethos

The ethos of our business is inspired by Sir Stanley’s famous ‘Matthews Move’, because we appreciate the importance of being adaptable and able to react to changes quickly.

Our partnership with Gray Dawes Sports means that we’re able to combine our old-school work ethic and commitment to quality with a cutting edge delivery model.

As proud contributors and founders of the Sir Stanley Matthews Coaching Foundation, we support its global aim to get young people active and playing sport.

Our Sporting Proposition

The partnership we have formed with Gray Dawes Sports means we’re able to offer you the very best of both worlds – market-leading travel management expertise with a thorough understanding of the nuances and unique demands of sports travel. We’re able to support every aspect of travel for the UK’s top sporting institutions, delivering outstanding solutions across the entirety of your travel programme.

Sports travel is like no other. We get that. Whether it’s mastering the complexity of arranging travel for dozens of umpires to cover county cricket over an entire summer’s worth of fixtures, or creating the perfect Caribbean holiday for the Premier League’s most demanding striker, we’ve got it covered.
